name: 營養生化（一）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【NSU0007  營養學（二）】、【NSU0009  生物化學】
description: 本課程以講演、討論進行，藉由師大數位學習平台的實施機制，協助學習者了解人體從細胞至消化道系統及巨量營養素於新陳代謝中扮演之角色與能量代謝之功能，分階段探討醣類、脂質與蛋白質之代謝路徑，介紹上述營養素於人體新陳代謝中扮演之角色與能量代謝之功能。
goals: 介紹巨量營養素與部分水溶性維生素新陳代謝中之生化生理功能
探討Krebs Cycle, Cori Cycle, & Glucose Alanine Cycle 之代謝路徑
學習神經傳導物質之生成與影響
認識蛋白質體與基因體之基本關係
syllabus:
1\. The Cell: A Microcosm of Life and The Digestive System: Mechanism for Nourishing the Body

2. Carbohydrates: Structural Features, Classification, Digestion, Absorption, Transport, Distribution and Glycemic Response to Carbohydrates

3\. Carbohydrates: Glycogenesis, Glycogenolysis and Glycolysis

4\. Carbohydrates: Substrate-Level Phosphorylation, The Tricarboxylic Acid Cycle, and Formation of ATP

5\. Carbohydrates: The Hexosemonophosphate Shunt, Gluconeogenesis and Regulation of Metabolism

6. Midterm I

7\. Lipids: Structure and Biological Importance, Digestion, Absorption, Transport, and storage

8\. Lipids: Catabolism of Triacylglycerols, Fatty Acids, Energy Considerations in Fatty Acid Oxidation

9\. Lipids: Formation of the Ketone Bodies, and Catabolism of Cholesterol

10\. Lipids: Synthesis of Fatty Acids, Triacylglycerols, and Cholesterol

11\. Lipids: Regulation of Lipid Metabolism

12. Midterm II

13\. Protein: Protein Structure and Organization, Amino Acid Classification, Sources of Protein, Digestion, and Absorption

14\. Amino Acid Metabolism (I)

15\. Amino Acid Metabolism（II）

16\. Amino Acid Metabolism（III）

17\. Interorgan “Flow” of Amino Acids and Organ-Specific Metabolism 

 18. Final

methodologies.note: 全程藉由師大數位學習平台(PPT)的實施機制來執行教學。
鼓勵學習者主動提問與參與討論，表現優良者學期平均成績加分。
融入師大數位學習平台、網路連結(如You Tube)等。

grading.note: 三次試卷均以英文出題，以提升學習者之英語專業能力。
